summary: Researched publication best practices for Lean proofs with sorry statements. Recommend Option B: provide only the forward direction of Truth Lemma (sorry-free) since it suffices for completeness. Mathlib and AFP have strict no-sorry policies. The omega-rule limitation is fundamental, not fixable.

artifacts.summary: Research report on publication best practices for handling sorry statements in formal Lean proofs, with recommendation to restructure Truth Lemma as forward-direction-only

next_steps: Run /plan 816 to create implementation plan for restructuring Truth Lemma
